title: sandhyAdEvIm
sahitya:
sandhyAdEvIm sAvitrIm vara gAyatrIm sarasvatIm bhajEham


anupallavi

 vindhyAcala nivasita vishAlinIm vidhi guruguha sannuta varadAyinIm


caraNam   guptatara mArga kuLa yOginIm guNinIm gOvinda jananIm naLinIm 
satya sankalpa tamOpahAriNIm sakAra rUpiNIm sampradAyinIm 
saptasvara mAtrkA rUpiNIm samsAra duhkkha shamanIm dhaninIm 
tatpada lakSyArtha rUpiNIm samayAcAra pravarttinIm
